channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AK

item.title: Report X-2024100448
item.description:
Report X-2024100448

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-09T09:22:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-09
  • City: ANC
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: X-ray machine, showed aerosol cans, the concave bottoms were noticeable. Upon doing a targeted physical search, eight (8) aerosol cans were discovered. 4 x 6 ounces 4 x 11 ounces

item.title: Report X-2024100444
item.description:
Report X-2024100444

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-09T09:22:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-05
  • City: ANC
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Xray image showed something suspicious, physical search resulting in discovery of 3 lithium ion batteries, each 24 Wh, terminals unprotected. Had the discovery not been made, the batteries would have been transported on a passenger carrying aircraft.

item.title: Report X-2024091946
item.description:

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0

  • Description: While screening shipment through x-ray found a piece that looked like an aerosol can. Performed physical screening and located one shave gel can, removed piece from shipment and verified remaining items approved to ship.
